title: Features
text: Work Follow, Front Office, CRM Module, Pre-Accounting, Cost Monitoring, Cost Management, Consulting Module, Document Management, Archive Management, Team Work, Event Management, Personal Definitions.

section.title: Workflow
section.content: MediLaw is an integrated software product that can respond to all requests from A to Z of a law office that works as a singular or team.

section.title: Front Office
section.content: You can add, edit and access all the details about your clients at any time.

section.title: CRM Module
section.content: You can make corporate notifications or special day celebrations with sms and e-mails about all your processes.

section.title: Pre-Accounting
section.content: You can make relational current transactions between the main cash account, employee accounts and client accounts.

section.title: Cost Monitoring
section.content: You can add income or income to client accounts, upload documents related to account transactions to the system and prepare account transactions report with one touch.

section.title: Cost Management
section.content: By specifying the authorization for cost claims, you can ensure that unauthorized user-entered costs are reviewed and processed after approval by the authorized user.

section.title: Consulting Module
section.content: You can add, edit, and access the services provided within the scope of consultancy files and consultancy services, and provide the services you provide to your clients as reports.

section.title: Document Management
section.content: You can upload documents from your clients to cloud servers and access them at any time.

section.title: Archive Management
section.content: You can easiliy manage your archive by making physical archive definitions for your files.
